_comment: Production config for factory PC monitoring (10,000+ PCs)

cpu._comment: CPU usage changes rapidly, 10s for quick anomaly detection

memory._comment: Memory leaks need early detection, 10s interval

disk._comment: Disk I/O patterns, 30s is sufficient for trend analysis

network._comment: Network traffic patterns change quickly, 10s for monitoring

temperature._comment: CPU temp changes but thermal events take seconds, 30s is safe

cpu_process._comment: Track top CPU consumers and specific processes, 30s for patterns

memory_process._comment: Track memory hogs and specific processes, 30s for leak detection

fan._comment: Fan speed follows temperature, 30s matches temperature interval

gpu._comment: GPU metrics for workload monitoring, 30s is sufficient

storage_smart._comment: S.M.A.R.T values change over hours/days, 5min reduces I/O overhead

voltage._comment: PSU voltage is very stable, 60s is plenty for anomaly detection

motherboard_temp._comment: Ambient temp changes slowly, 60s is sufficient
